scripts.test:ts: pnpm -C apps/cli lint && pnpm -C apps/cli test && pnpm -C apps/web lint && pnpm -C apps/web test
scripts.test:contract: pnpm --dir tests/contract lint && pnpm --dir tests/contract test
scripts.test:all: pnpm run test:go && pnpm run test:ts && pnpm run test:contract && pnpm run test:smoke
